languages.text: {n}Вы прикрываете глаза и медленно проваливаетесь в сумрак дремы, пока все более далекий голос продолжает желать вашему роду всевозможных озарений, ниспосланий, священных даров... наконец, чей-то неловкий кашель выдергивает вас из сладкого забвения. Префект, видимо, уже закончившая свою речь некоторое время назад — молча взирает на вас — как и маршал, и все остальные в зале.{/n}

{n}Your eyes drift shut. You slowly plunge ever deeper into the darkness of sleep, while a voice, growing more and more distant, continues to wish you and your progeny epiphanies and boons of every kind... until an awkward cough jerks you suddenly out of your sweet torpor. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы прикрываете глаза и медленно проваливаетесь в сумрак дремы, пока все более далекий голос продолжает желать вашему роду всевозможных озарений, ниспосланий, священных даров... наконец, чей-то неловкий кашель выдергивает вас из сладкого забвения. Префект, видимо, уже закончившая свою речь некоторое время назад — молча взирает на вас — как и маршал, и все остальные в зале.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos yeux se ferment et vous plongez lentement mais sûrement dans les ténèbres ouatées du sommeil tandis qu'une voix de plus en plus lointaine continue à vous prodiguer moult grâces et bénédictions, à vous et à vos descendants... jusqu'au moment où un toussotement gêné vous arrache subitement à votre douce torpeur. La préfète, qui semble avoir fini de parler depuis un moment, vous regarde sans mot dire, de même que le maréchal et l'ensemble des témoins en présence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes drift shut. You slowly plunge ever deeper into the darkness of sleep, while a voice, growing more and more distant, continues to wish you and your progeny epiphanies and boons of every kind... until an awkward cough jerks you suddenly out of your sweet torpor. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos yeux se ferment et vous plongez lentement mais sûrement dans les ténèbres ouatées du sommeil tandis qu'une voix de plus en plus lointaine continue à vous prodiguer moult grâces et bénédictions, à vous et à vos descendants... jusqu'au moment où un toussotement gêné vous arrache subitement à votre douce torpeur. La préfète, qui semble avoir fini de parler depuis un moment, vous regarde sans mot dire, de même que le maréchal et l'ensemble des témoins en présence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus párpados se vuelven pesados. Caes cada vez con más profundidad en la oscuridad del sueño mientras una voz cada vez más distante os sigue deseando a ti y a tu progenie toda clase de epifanías y bendiciones... hasta que una tos incómoda te saca bruscamente de tu dulce torpor. La prefecta, que parece haber terminado de hablar hace un tiempo, te mira sin decir palabra, al igual que el Mariscal y el resto de la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes drift shut. You slowly plunge ever deeper into the darkness of sleep, while a voice, growing more and more distant, continues to wish you and your progeny epiphanies and boons of every kind... until an awkward cough jerks you suddenly out of your sweet torpor. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus párpados se vuelven pesados. Caes cada vez con más profundidad en la oscuridad del sueño mientras una voz cada vez más distante os sigue deseando a ti y a tu progenie toda clase de epifanías y bendiciones... hasta que una tos incómoda te saca bruscamente de tu dulce torpor. La prefecta, que parece haber terminado de hablar hace un tiempo, te mira sin decir palabra, al igual que el Mariscal y el resto de la sala.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的眼皮渐渐合拢，不知何时陷入了甘美的黑暗之中。某个声音飘得越来越远，祝福你和你的后代得到各种各样的恩赐与祝福……随后，尴尬的咳嗽声将你从甜蜜的梦境中惊醒。面前的行政官似乎早已发言完毕，正一言不发地看着你。房间里的其他人和元帅本人，此刻也将目光集中在你的身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes drift shut. You slowly plunge ever deeper into the darkness of sleep, while a voice, growing more and more distant, continues to wish you and your progeny epiphanies and boons of every kind... until an awkward cough jerks you suddenly out of your sweet torpor. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的眼皮渐渐合拢，不知何时陷入了甘美的黑暗之中。某个声音飘得越来越远，祝福你和你的后代得到各种各样的恩赐与祝福……随后，尴尬的咳嗽声将你从甜蜜的梦境中惊醒。面前的行政官似乎早已发言完毕，正一言不发地看着你。房间里的其他人和元帅本人，此刻也将目光集中在你的身上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir fallen die Augen zu. Du sinkst langsam in einen tiefen Schlaf, während eine immer weiter entfernte Stimme dir und deinen Nachkommen allerlei Offenbarungen und Segen wünscht ... bis dich ein peinliches Hüsteln mit einem Mal aus deinen süßen Träumen weckt. Die Präfektin, die ihre Ansprache schon vor einer ganzen Weile beendet zu haben scheint, blickt dich ebenso wie der Marschall und alle anderen Anwesenden wortlos an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes drift shut. You slowly plunge ever deeper into the darkness of sleep, while a voice, growing more and more distant, continues to wish you and your progeny epiphanies and boons of every kind... until an awkward cough jerks you suddenly out of your sweet torpor. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir fallen die Augen zu. Du sinkst langsam in einen tiefen Schlaf, während eine immer weiter entfernte Stimme dir und deinen Nachkommen allerlei Offenbarungen und Segen wünscht ... bis dich ein peinliches Hüsteln mit einem Mal aus deinen süßen Träumen weckt. Die Präfektin, die ihre Ansprache schon vor einer ganzen Weile beendet zu haben scheint, blickt dich ebenso wie der Marschall und alle anderen Anwesenden wortlos an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの目が閉じかける。ゆっくりと深い眠りの中に落ちていく。声はだんだんと遠くなり、あなたとあなたの子孫のひらめきとあらゆる願い事を望み続けて…気まずい咳が突然、甘い眠りからあなたを目覚めさせる。少しばかり前に話し終えたように見える総監が無言であなたを見ており、将帥や部屋の他の全員があなたを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes drift shut. You slowly plunge ever deeper into the darkness of sleep, while a voice, growing more and more distant, continues to wish you and your progeny epiphanies and boons of every kind... until an awkward cough jerks you suddenly out of your sweet torpor. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの目が閉じかける。ゆっくりと深い眠りの中に落ちていく。声はだんだんと遠くなり、あなたとあなたの子孫のひらめきとあらゆる願い事を望み続けて…気まずい咳が突然、甘い眠りからあなたを目覚めさせる。少しばかり前に話し終えたように見える総監が無言であなたを見ており、将帥や部屋の他の全員があなたを見ている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerin kapanıyor. Yavaş yavaş uykunun karanlığına gömülüyorsun. Bu sırada gitgide uzaklaşan bir ses, sana ve soyuna her türlü aydınlanmayı ve nimeti dilemeye devam ediyor. Sonrasında garip bir öksürük, tatlı uyuşukluk hâlinin bir anda sonlanmasına yol açıyor. Bir süre önce konuşmasını bitirmiş gibi duran prefekt, odadaki diğer herkes gibi sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes drift shut. The prefect, who appears to have finished speaking some time ago, is looking at you wordlessly, as is the Marshal, along with everyone else in the room.{/n}

Sonrasında garip bir öksürük, tatlı uyuşukluk hâlinin bir anda sonlanmasına yol açıyor. Bir süre önce konuşmasını bitirmiş gibi duran prefekt, odadaki diğer herkes gibi sana bakıyor.{/n}
